name: getSystemTotalMemory
returns: Memory that is available in bytes.
description: Gets details of the memory that is available for the operating system, in bytes.

params.name: region
params.description: Indicates the cache region from which to remove the stored objects. If no value is specified, default cache region is considered by default.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: the in-memory file system memory set in cfadmin and should return that.
